name: charles biggers
dieMessage: NOOOOOOOOO I'M DEAD AND THAT MEANS THERE ARE NO MORE DOG DICKS!!!!! AAAAAAAAAGGGGGHGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH charles @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@biggers@c-reset@ screams with his last breath.

attackMessages.message: BROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO WHY R U IN MY HOUSE I'M GOING TO PISS ON U BROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO. @npc-color-name@ pisses on u
GIVE ME BACK MY SAUSAGE STUFFERS AND DOG DICKS AAAAAARRRRRRGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH. @npc-color-name@ dumps a giant bag of dog dicks and ham sandwiches on @player-name@!

I FIGHT FOR THE HONOR OF KELLI BIGGERS AND ARKANSAS GOD IM SO FUCKING ANGRY THAT MCDONALDS DIDN'T BRING BACK THE MCRIB AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH. The @npc-color-name@ tries to eat @player-name@!

criticalAttackMessages.message: OHHHHHHHHHH FUCK I JUST WENT TO POSTMASTERS GRILL AND HAD 4 POUNDS OF BRISKET UHHHHHHHHHHHHH SHIT. The @npc-color-name@ sits on @player-name@, @c-bold@@c-yellow@CRUSHING@c-reset@ @player-name@'s bones!

MY MOM GOT CRABS FROM FUCKING SEA APES, THEN SHE FUCKED LOBSTERS TO GET RID OF THE CRABS, BUT THE LOBSTERS GAVE HER GAY MANS CANCER. @npc-color-name@ @c-yellow@@c-bold-on@CONFUSES@c-reset@ @player-name@ to inches within death!

battleMessages.message: BROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO. The @npc-color-name@ grunts as he swipes his massive arms at @player-name@!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ eats a cheeseburger while snoring.
